text:
[Verse]
In the moonlight we sway
Feet on the cold grass
Shadows jump and play
Time don't move too fast

[Verse 2]
Stars are shining bright
Heartbeats echo slow
In this endless night
Wherever we go

[Chorus]
Dancin' shadows
Dancin' free
Just you and just me
In the night
We embrace
Lost in this magic place

[Verse 3]
Whisper secrets low
In the twilight's glow
Where the night winds blow
Everything we know

[Verse 4]
Hold on to this dream
In the midnight gleam
Life’s just like a stream
Flowing with the theme

[Chorus]
Dancin' shadows
Dancin' free
Just you and just me
In the night
We embrace
Lost in this magic place
title: Dancing Shadows
